text.body:
śrīādināthāya namo 'stu tasmai yenopadiṣṭā haṭhayogavidyā/
virājate pronnatarājayogam āroḍhum icchor adhirohaṇi ca//
praṇamya śrī gurūnāthaṃ svātmārāmeṇa yoginā/
kevalaṃ rājayogāya haṭhayogopadiśyate//
bhrāntvā bahumatva dhvānte rājayogam ajānatām/
haṭhapradipakāṃ cakre svātmārāmaḥ kṣamākaraḥ//
haṭhavidyāṃ hi matsyendragorakṣādyā vijānate/
svātmārāmo 'thavā yogī jānite tatprasādataḥ//
śrīādināthādi matsyendraśāgarānandabhairavā/
cauraṅgīmīnagaurakṣavirūpākṣyabileśayā// *
manthānabhairavo yogiśruddhabuddhaś ca kanthaḍī/
pauraṇṭakaḥ surānandaḥ siddhapādaś ca carpaṭi// *
kānerī pūrvapādaś ca siddhanātho nirañjanaṃ/
kapālibindunāthaś ca kākacaṇḍīśvarādaya//
allamaḥ prabhudevaś ca ghoḍācolī ca ciṃcaṇi/
vāsukir nāgabodhaś ca khaṇḍakāpālikas tathā//
ityādayo mahāsiddhā haṭhayogaprabhāvataḥ/
khaṇḍayitvā kāladaṇḍaṃ brahmāṇḍe vicaranti te//
saṃsāraśramataptānām āśrayo yaṃ haṭho mataḥ/
aśeṣayogayuktānām ādhārakamaṭho haṭha//
haṭhavidyāṃ paraṃ gopya yogināṃ siddhim icchatām/
bhaverd viryavati guptā nirviryā nu prakāśitā//
surājye dhārmike deśe surbhikṣe nirūpadrave/
ekānte maṭhikāmadhye sthātavyaṃ haṭhayoginā//
alpadvāram arandhragartaviṭapaṃ nātyuccanīcāyataṃ/
samyag gomayasāndraliptamamalaṃ nirdoṣabādhojjhitam/
bāhye maṇḍapavedikūparuciraṃ prākārasaṃveṣṭitaṃ/
proktaṃ yogamaṭhasya lakṣaṇam idaṃ siddhair haṭhābhyāsiddhi//
evaṃvidhe maṭhe sthitvā sarvacintāvivarjitāḥ/
gurūpadiṣṭamārgeṇa yogam eva samabhyaset//
atyāhāraḥ prayāsaś ca prajalpo niyamāgrahaḥ/
janasaṅgaś ca laulyaṃ ca ṣaḍbhir yogaś ca naśyati//
jayāc ca niścayād dhairyāt tattvajñānāc ca darśanāt/
janasaṅgaparityāgāt ṣaḍbhir yogaḥ prasidhyati//
atha yamaniyamāḥ//
ahiṃsā satyam asteyaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṣamā dhṛtiḥ/
dayārjavamitāhāraḥ śaucaṃ caiva yamā daśa//
tapaḥ saṃtoṣam āstikyaṃ dānam īśvarapūjanaṃ/
siddhāntaśravaṇaṃ caiva vedāṃtaśravaṇaṃ tathā//
haṭhasya prathamaṃgatvād āsanaṃ pūrvam ucyate/
kuryāt tad āsanaṃ tasmād ārogyāṃ cāṅgapāṭavaṃ//
vasiṣṭhādyaiś ca munirbhi matsyedrādyaiś ca yogibhiḥ/
aṅgīkṛtā nyāsanāni kathyante kānicinmayā//
jānūrvor antare samyak kṛtvā pādatale ubhe/
ṛjukāyasamāsīnaḥ svastikaṃ tat pracakṣate//
savye dakṣiṇagulphaṃ tu pṛṣṭaṃ pārśve niyojayet/
dakṣiṇe 'pi tathā savyaṃ gomukhaṃ gomukhaṃ yathā//
